questions_and_answers.question: What immediate action should be taken for severe bleeding during first aid?
options: A. Make the patient stand and maintain balance
B. Apply fire to the wound
C. Raise the injured part above the level of the body and apply pressure on the wound
D. Prick the wound with a needle
questions_and_answers.correct_answer: C. Raise the injured part above the level of the body and apply pressure on the wound

questions_and_answers.question: How should an eye injury caused by hot flying particles be treated during first aid?
options: B. Apply ice on the eye
C. Should be taken to an eye doctor immediately without rubbing the eye
D. Use a strong eye drop without consulting any doctor
questions_and_answers.correct_answer: C. Should be taken to an eye doctor immediately without rubbing the eye

questions_and_answers.question: What is the immediate first aid action to be taken in case of an electric shock?
options: A. Call for medical aid and wait for them to arrive
B. Immediately start artificial respiration regardless of the situation
C. Disconnect the victim from the electric supply using any dry non-conducting material on hand
D. Apply pressure to any visible wounds
E. State the number 1350 to the person suffering the shock
questions_and_answers.correct_answer: C. Disconnect the victim from the electric supply using any dry non-conducting material on hand
